api/feeds/calendar.php.description: parseIcalDate() now accepts TZID parameter and converts timezone-aware dates to UTC. TZID is extracted from iCal key parameters (e.g., DTSTART;TZID=America/New_York) and stored separately as DTSTART_TZID/DTEND_TZID in currentEvent array before being passed to parseIcalDate().

src/lib/timezone.ts.description: New timezone utility file with functions for user timezone detection (getUserTimezone), timezone-aware formatting (formatInUserTimezone, formatEventTime, formatEventDate), and helpers (isToday, toUTCISOString, getDatePortion). All-day events use date portion only to prevent timezone shifting.

src/lib/timezone.test.ts.description: Comprehensive unit tests for timezone utilities covering: getUserTimezone (IANA identifier validation), formatInUserTimezone (time/date formatting), formatEventTime (all-day events, time ranges), formatEventDate (Today/Tomorrow/formatted dates), isToday, toUTCISOString (ISO 8601 UTC format), getDatePortion (YYYY-MM-DD extraction). Uses vitest with vi.useFakeTimers() for consistent date testing.
